title: The Rake
description: A New York Times Bestselling Author Once upon a time, the notorious Viscount Dare charmed Lady Georgiana Halley out of her innocence -- to win a wager, no less! -- and now he must pay dearly. The plan is She will use all her seductive wiles to win Dare's heart ... and then break it. But his smoldering gaze once again tempts Georgiana to give in to desire -- and when he astonishes her with a marriage proposal, she Is he playing yet another game ... or could it truly be love this time? Available only in Core 7 Standing Orders.
author: Suzanne Enoch
